meanings.definition: Capable of being shaped or molded.
meanings.sent1: The clay was shapeable, allowing the artist to create intricate sculptures.
meanings.sent2: The playdough is shapeable, so children can make various shapes and figures.
meanings.sent3: The shapeable cookie dough made it easy for the baker to create fun shapes for the party.
meanings.sent4: Her flexible attitude was as shapeable as clay, adapting to any situation effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The shapeable material could be molded into any form the designer desired.

meanings.definition: Able to be formed into a particular shape.
meanings.sent1: The shapeable rubber could be molded into different shapes for the project.
meanings.sent2: The shapeable plastic can be formed into specific shapes using a mold.
meanings.sent3: The shapeable dough was transformed into a perfect heart shape for the cake topper.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were as shapeable as clay, easily taking on new perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The shapeable material allowed for endless possibilities in design and creation.
